title: Russell's real feelings over stalled F1 contract: what you missed at the Austrian GP
summary: You had to read between the lines at the 2025 Austrian Grand Prix as George Russell dropped hints over about his dissatisfaction, and F1 sent a message to FIA president Mohammed Ben Sulayem

qa_pairs.question: Which team does George Russell drive for in Formula 1?
Who is the president of the FIA as of 2023?
In which year did George Russell express his dissatisfaction regarding his contract during the Austrian Grand Prix?
